best_friends.name: We'll be best friends...
best_friends.description: Playmates are accompanied by larger packs of monsters
best_friends.flavorText: "We'll be best friends, beast!" — Einhar Frey

until_slaughter.name: ...Until we slaughter you!
until_slaughter.effect: Add an additional modifier to Playmate's pack
until_slaughter.description: Each Playmate pack gains one additional dangerous modifier

capable_experiencing.name: Capable of experiencing
capable_experiencing.effect: Player in the Great Hunt map is +1% more delirious per map modifier
capable_experiencing.description: Map modifiers increase delirium intensity. Extremely dangerous but rewarding.

juicy_one.name: That was a juicy one!
juicy_one.description: Maps can contain one additional Playmate (capped by rare monster count)
juicy_one.flavorText: "That was a juicy one!" — Einhar Frey

welcome_omen.name: You are a welcome omen!
welcome_omen.effect: Each Playmate has 10% chance to be converted
welcome_omen.description: Choose one: Convert to Rogue Exile, Essence monster, or possessed by Azmeri Spirit
choices: Be converted into a Rogue Exile
Be converted into an Essence monster
Be possessed by an additional Azmeri Spirit
welcome_omen.flavorText: "You are a welcome omen!" — Einhar Frey

love_hunting.name: I... love hunting!
love_hunting.effect: Unique monsters in a Great Hunt map have an additional modifier
love_hunting.description: All unique monsters become more dangerous

caught.name: This one is caught!
caught.effect: Great Hunt Maps have at least one Summoning Circle; summoned boss drops at least one Organ
caught.description: Guarantees boss encounters and organ drops

hunt_or_hunted.name: Hunt or be hunted, exile!
hunt_or_hunted.effect: Great Hunt Map boss does not grant experience. Map Boss' loot is Lucky
hunt_or_hunted.description: Trade experience for doubled loot quality
hunt_or_hunted.flavorText: "Hunt or be hunted, exile!" — Einhar Frey

rare_ichor.name: A rare Ichor
rare_ichor.effect: Test Subject has an additional modifier
rare_ichor.description: Makes Test Subjects more dangerous but more rewarding

cruel_beyond.name: Cruel beyond measure
cruel_beyond.effect: Test Subject has an additional modifier. Choose enhancement
cruel_beyond.description: Test Subject gains one additional modifier plus your choice
choices: Be possessed by an additional Azmeri Spirit
Be followed by an additional Playmate's pack

sorrow_spite.name: Sorrow and Spite
sorrow_spite.effect: Test Subject is followed by an additional Playmate's pack per Trophy Cage used
sorrow_spite.description: More Trophy Cages = more monster packs during Test Subject fight

slow_progress.name: Slow progress is still progress
slow_progress.effect: Test subject has 5% to drop organs used. Thaumaturgic crafting has 5% to fail
slow_progress.description: Risk crafting failure for a chance to reclaim organs. High risk, high reward.
slow_progress.warning: Crafting can fail and consume all ingredients!
slow_progress.flavorText: "Slow progress is still progress." — Tane Octavius
